ComicInfo.Summary:
Can the unexpected entrance of an old villain help the Savage Avengers overcome the monstrous Kulan Gath? The entire Earth better hope so!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|---------------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Valerio Giangiordano & Frank D'Armata | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Cory Smith | 2 |
